problem.markdown:
>>As you decrease the height of the SDOF system, what happens to the frequency?<<
(x) The frequency increases ( ) The frequency decreases ( ) The frequency remains the same
[explanation] As you decrease the height the system becomes stiffer, meaning it displaces less, and the frequency or rate of oscillations increases, meaning the system moves faster. [explanation]
problem.p: As you decrease the height of the SDOF system, what happens to the frequency?

choicegroup.label: As you decrease the height of the SDOF system, what happens to the frequency?

div.p: As you decrease the height the system becomes stiffer, meaning it displaces less, and the frequency or rate of oscillations increases, meaning the system moves faster.
